amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the high-threat, high-density urban area program by $50 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding, by transfer, the appropriation for state and local programs under Protection, Preparedness, Response and Recovery by $50,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 174 (Roll no. 453).
